snippet: Dr. Bormann, an ecologist who taught at Dartmouth and Yale, spotted the new environmental danger with a team of scientists while doing research in a New Hampshire forest in 1971.
abstract: F Herbert Bormann, plant ecologist who documented acid rain, dies at age 90.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Bormann, an ecologist who taught at Dartmouth and Yale, spotted the new environmental danger with a team of scientists while doing research in a New Hampshire forest in 1971.

headline.seo: F. Herbert Bormann, Ecologist, Dies at 90
headline.main: F. Herbert Bormann Dies at 90; Helped Discover Acid Rain Threat
headline.print_headline: F. Herbert Bormann, 90, Dies; Documented Acid Rain
